name: excel-mcp-server
description: MCP Server for Excel file operations with 34 tools using ExcelJS
long_description: A powerful Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for working with Excel files. Provides comprehensive tools for reading, writing, formatting, analyzing Excel spreadsheets, creating charts, pivot tables, conditional formatting, and much more. Built with TypeScript and ExcelJS for maximum reliability and type safety.
